pitch_limit_min.description: Vertical limit minimum, in degrees (-90 straight down, 90 straight up).

pitch_limit_max.description: Vertical limit maximum, in degrees (-90 straight down, 90 straight up).

yaw_limit_min.description: Horizontal limit minimum, in degrees (-180 backwards counter clockwise, 180 backwards clockwise).

yaw_limit_max.description: Horizontal limit maximum, in degrees (-180 backwards counter clockwise, 180 backwards clockwise).

pitch_deadzone.description: Vertical deadzone, in degrees (If outside the limits, we do not switch side if we are within 'deadzone' degrees of backwards).

yaw_deadzone.description: Horizontal deadzone, in degrees (If outside the limits, we do not switch side if we are within 'deadzone' degrees of backwards).
